sealed after a discussion yesterday with Nick Clegg . Robinson told The Independent that George Osborne and Andy Coulson were not so different. Both are skilful in communicating simple messages from complicated stories and neither man craves the spotlight. I suspect[ Craig George Osborne ] will be delighted if the public never hears his name after the news of his appointment. He will live or die in that job by his capacity to shape clear messages for David Cameron and find ways to communicate them, he said.
